properties.entry: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, BOARD_TITLE FROM BOARD JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = 1 ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT * FROM( SELECT B.* FROM( SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM,A.* FROM ( SELECT BOARD_TITLE,ANSWER_STATUS FROM BOARD B JOIN USER_INFO ON (BOARD_WRITER=USER_NO) JOIN CATEGORY USING (CATEGORY_NO) WHERE B.STATUS='Y' AND BOARD_TYPE = '3' ORDER BY CREATE_DATE ASC) A) ORDER BY RNUM DESC) B) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, RS.* FROM ( SELECT ENROLL_NO,USER_NAME,RD.INT_DOM_ID ,R.BOOKING_NO,R.RESERVATION_DATE,R.FLIGHT_NO FROM RESERVATION R JOIN RESERVATION_DETAIL RD ON (RD.BOOKING_NO = R.BOOKING_NO) JOIN USER_INFO U ON (U.USER_NO = R.ENROLL_NO) AND R.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY R.RESERVATION_DATE DESC ) RS ORDER BY RNUM DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 2
